goal: Get a functional, polished, and accessible MVP live with minimal friction.

tasks.task: Add ARIA labels to cards, buttons, and game states
tasks.details: Added comprehensive ARIA labels, roles, and keyboard navigation support
Improved text contrast ratios and disabled state visibility

tasks.task: Announce turn/win/game state updates to screen readers
tasks.details: Added live regions for game state announcements and screen reader support

tasks.task: Add haptic feedback (navigator.vibrate) on card play/discard
tasks.details: Implemented haptic feedback for card selection (25ms), discard (50ms), and draw (75ms)

tasks.task: Display gesture hints/tutorial for first-time users
tasks.details: Added interactive tutorial overlay with gesture instructions and mobile-specific tips

tasks.task: Adjust 4-player layouts to prevent cramped UIs
tasks.details: Optimized card sizes, spacing, and layout for 4+ player games on mobile
Added CSS safe area support for notched devices and modern mobile screens

tasks.task: Switch card assets to WebP/AVIF with lazy loading
tasks.details: Added lazy loading and async decoding to card images for better performance

tasks.task: Optimize polling intervals with exponential backoff until WebSockets are ready
tasks.details: Implemented exponential backoff (1.5x multiplier, max 10s) for failed API calls

deliverable: A playable, accessible card game MVP that runs smoothly on mobile and has basic inclusivity built-in.
achievements: ✅ Safe area support for modern devices
